2/4/26, 2:22 PM Page Printer Formatting Aid (PPFA) - Jenski - Test portal- RPD Linux
Overview
Overview / Color and Grayscale Printing / RICOH AFP color and grayscale products / Print servers / RICOH InfoPrint Manager / Page Printer Formatting Aid (PPFA )
Page Printer Formatting Aid (PPFA)
PPFA is a feature of RICOH InfoPrint Manager that lets you create form definitions and page definitions for use with your AFP print jobs. You can
use PPFA to associate CMRs with form definitions and page definitions for your color print jobs.
The form definitions and page definitions that you create using PPFA can be used in print jobs that are sent to RICOH InfoPrint Manager and
RICOH ProcessDirector.
Parent topic: RICOH InfoPrint Manager
1 of 1
